supportDesc.support: Fragments 1-18 (in mm), (1) 17 x 19, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (2) 50 x 26, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (3) 43 x 32, (A) 4 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (4) 47 x 19, (A) 4 lines, right margin, (B) blank, (5) 34 x 37, (A) 2 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (6) 48 x 36, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (7) 43 x 38, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) 2 lines, top left margins, (8) 34 x 26, (A) 5 lines, right margins, (B) blank, (9) 27 x 18, (A) 4 lines, left margin, (B) 1 line, left margin, (10) 25 x 22, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) 2 lines, top margin, (11) 35 x 26, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) 4 lines, right margin, (12) 41 x 20, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (13) 31 x 20, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) traces of 2 lines, (14) 75 x 82, (A) 2 cols., (col. i) 2 lines, right bottom margins, (col. ii) 5 lines, left bottom margins, (B) blank, (15) 50 x 8, (A) 9 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (16) 88 x 34, (A) 7 lines, right bottom (?) margins, (B) blank, (17) 100 x 24, (A) 6 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (18) 85 x 14, (A) 12 lines, no margins, (B) blank
